about_the_game:
Bite Size Terrors:

Are Short Experimental Horror Experiences each with their own Unique Genres and Styles.
From the Creator of Notebook Entries, this is...

Reverse Blue:

  • An Atmospheric Mystery.
  • Use your Pod to fly around & Investigate the events surrounding your fellow Air Mates.
  • Fear Open Space, the only thing between you & the ground, is a Bright Blue Sky.

Story:

As an engineer, your objective is to make sure your fellow air companions are doing okay mentally & that their Ethers are operational.
Ethers are used to survey Weather Disturbances & Conduct Research.
Today, as you float across the sky, an Ether is unusually floating below the clouds.
HQ encourages you to investigate the matter, as you do, you slowly realize,
This Bright Blue Sky... Is Hiding Something.

Gameplay:

Control a Pod in an open blue sky. Clouds cover your view at a distance, while you try to find each Ether to uncover the truth.
Look through logs, investigate each Ether & the outside air around you.
